synopsis.text: Princess Sapphire, the heir to the throne of Silverland, is born with a unique condition: she possesses both a boy's spirit and a girl's body, thanks to a playful angel's prank. To circumvent the kingdom's archaic law that forbids a woman from ruling, Sapphire is raised as a prince. But when malevolent ministers threaten to expose her secret, Sapphire takes on a dual identity as the chivalrous 'Princess Knight' to protect her kingdom and uphold justice. Alongside her unconventional guardian angel, Tink, Sapphire embarks on thrilling escapades, battling adversaries and even transforming into a swan. Amidst these trials, she finds herself entangled in a romantic predicament with Prince Franz Charming from a neighboring kingdom. Will Sapphire successfully navigate the complexities of her double life, defend her throne, and find true love? Join her on this enchanting journey to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
